snippet: Figures for July suggest that economic growth is gaining speed.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of service-sector growth rose in July to 56, up from 52.2 in June; pace was driven by brisk sales and jump in new orders; increase suggests economic growth could be picking up after weak start.
lead_paragraph: Figures for July suggest that economic growth is gaining speed.

headline.main: Sales and New Orders Bolster Growth in the Service Industry
headline.print_headline: Sales and New Orders Bolster Growth in the Service Industry
